column1: # Your code here to extract artifact details from the text

# Your code here to create a CSV file with the artifact details

This is a description of a Bronze Statue. It was found in the Acropolis and is estimated to be 2000 years old. The artifact is made of bronze and has detailed carvings. It is currently kept in the British Museum and is in an intact condition. The artifact has inscriptions in Greek and is related to artifact with id 67890 and 11223.
